text: Andrea Mastino (born 2 September 1999) is an Italian footballer who plays for Prato as a right back. ==Club career== Born in Carbonia, Sardinia, and represented Cagliari as a youth. On 30 November 2016 he made his first team debut, starting in a 3–0 Coppa Italia away loss against Sampdoria, but being replaced at half-time. On 30 July 2020 he joined Serie D club Prato. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from the Province of South Sardinia Category:Footballers from Sardinia Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Cagliari Calcio players Category:Olbia Calcio 1905 players Category:U.S. Gavorrano players Category:A.C. title: Andrea Mastino
